metadata.title: CVE-2017-6505 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The ohci_service_ed_list function in hw/usb/hcd-ohci.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator) before 2.9.0 allows local guest OS users to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via vectors involving the number of link endpoint list descriptors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9330.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2.1').
